page.title: 10Crawley,Oxfordshire.
page.content: Crawley is a peaceful village 1 mile from Witney and is in a small valley.There are no shops.A Library Van comes once a fortnight and a milkman comes every 4 days.They had 4 Pubs but now there are only 2,The Lamb and The New Inn.St.Peter's Church was closed in 1984 and now people go either to Hailey or Witney.The houses in Crawley are a mixture of old and new.Manor Farm is on the edge of Crawley and was built in the15th.and 16th.Century.The farmer keeps sheep and it is mainly rough pasture.
